ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Controllers

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Controllers.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Approver, Claimant

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class to Approver and Claimant. Most of the methods are abstract, but it provides the get and set methods for a user's name and location. It should be used to conform user objects to act in wanted ways; child classes must implement these methods and thus must have certain functionality Classes it works with: Location,Claim,(Claimant,Approver - implicitly)
